cab.content:
(This Document is the Property of His Britannic Majesty's Government.)
SECRET
G.T. 4355
BATTLE SITUATION - EVENING - 26th APRIL, 1918.
Heavy fighting is continuing between YPRES and DRANOUTRE. It is reported that the Germans have captured VOOKMEZEELE, and that they are launching attacks against LA CLYTTE and SCHERPENBURG Hill.
2. Fighting on the Southern slopes of the VILLERS - BRETONNEUX plateau is still going on, especially in, and South of HANGARD Wood, and in the vicinity of HANGARD village.
3. There is no change on the rest of the Front.
?eral Staff,
War Office, S.W.1.
26th April, 1918,
Issued at 6.30 p.m.
